Name: Skyshaker
Desc: A special firecracker sold at the Fireworks Shop. After equipping this to Utility, you can throw firecrackers to damage enemies. (Only available during the "By Moon's Grace" Event and will be removed from Backpack after the Event ends.)
Bg: A special firecracker made by following a secret blueprint found in Xisha. Refrain from using this in crowded areas as it is both powerful and loud.
